profile:
We have been local since 1983.  Our team provides waterproofing and wet basement services, free estimates and bring a very highly skilled and experienced team together.

Our newly renovated central office and is located at 1055 Stoney Point Rd, Quinte West, ON. 

From here we dispatch for jobs to west of Port Hope, toward Peterborough, north of Tweed, east of Belleville.  We cover the counties of Northumberland, Peterborough, Hastings, Prince Edward County.

Our primary solutions are exterior and interior wraps.  We apply epoxy crack repair solutions.

The team of nearly 10 tradesmen covers additional specializations.  We are insured, have completed projects to maintain properties beyond waterproofing solutions for wet basements.  As related to core waterproofing needs, we also do block repair on foundations, closing old basement doorways, fixing exterior stairwells.  Separate from waterproofing, we have multiple in-house experts in carpentry, driveway repair, roofing and more.
specialities: Interior waterproofing wraps and crack repairs, exterior excavations and wraps.
memberships: Chambers of Commerce - Belleville, Peterborough, Northumberland
name: Quick Fix Waterproofing
